name: Alfamon
description: Alfamon is a pokemon-like NFT game built on Base, where players can collect and evolve unique creatures called “alfamons” through interactions with Farcaster.

actions.name: Incubate
actions.description: Level Up your alfamon for the first time, just click on the button: Incubate

actions.name: Secret Incubation

actions.name: Follow Up
